trans-unit.source: Represents a set of proposed changes to a running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et sett med endringer til en arbeidsflytforekomst som kjører.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] All proposed changes to a running workflow instance must be made using a WorkflowChanges object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Alle endringer til en arbeidsflytforekomst som kjører må gjøres ved bruk av en WorkflowChanges-objekt.

trans-unit.source: When a WorkflowChanges object is constructed in application code (outside the workflow instance), the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> object that is passed to the constructor must be the object that is returned by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowDefinition%2A> method of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> class.
trans-unit.target: Når et objekt for WorkflowChanges bygges i application-kode (utenfor arbeidsflytforekomsten), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>objektet som er sendt til konstruktøren må være objektet som er returnert av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowDefinition%2A>metoden for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>klasse.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowDefinition%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The root <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Roten <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> av arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: rootActivity is a null reference (Visual Basic ).
trans-unit.target: rootActivityer en nullreferanse (Visual Basic ).

trans-unit.source: rootActivity is not a .
trans-unit.target: rootActivityis not a .

trans-unit.source: rootActivity is in design mode.
trans-unit.target: rootActivityer i utformingsmodus.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the condition that must be satisfied to apply the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angir betingelsen som må oppfylles for å bruke den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property can be set on a root activity to disallow dynamic updates to the running workflow.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan angis for en rotaktivitet til ikke å tillate dynamiske oppdateringer i kjører arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: When the property is set on the root activity, and condition evaluates to `false`, the dynamic updates are disallowed on the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen er satt på root-aktivitet, og betingelse evalueres til `false`, dynamiske oppdateringer er ikke tillatt på arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: If the condition evaluates to `true`, or the condition is not set, the dynamic updates are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis betingelsen, vurderes `true`, eller betingelsen ikke er angitt, dynamiske oppdateringer tillates.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the condition property on a dependency object.
trans-unit.target: Henter condition-egenskap for et Avhengighetsobjekt som.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.ConditionProperty> is an attached dependency property, that is, it is declared and used by one type and set on another.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.ConditionProperty>er en vedlagte avhengighetsegenskap som er det er deklarert som brukes av én type og angitt i en annen.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.ConditionProperty>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, there must be static `get` and `set` methods on the type declaring the property.
trans-unit.target: Det derfor må være statiske `get` og `set` metoder for typen deklarerer egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Helper method for getting <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.ConditionProperty>.
trans-unit.target: Helper metode for å hente <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.ConditionProperty>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.ConditionProperty>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> (or derived type) that contains a condition property, such as the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity"></xref> and <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref> activities.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref> (eller avledede typen) som inneholder en condition-egenskap som den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity"> </xref> og <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref> aktiviteter.

trans-unit.source: A condition property type, such as <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En betingelse av typen, slik som <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: dependencyObject is null ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: dependencyObjecter null ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: dependencyObject is not a or a type that derives from .
trans-unit.target: dependencyObjecter ikke en eller en type som er avledet fra .

trans-unit.source: Sets the condition property on a dependency object.
trans-unit.target: Angir condition-egenskap for et Avhengighetsobjekt som.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.ConditionProperty> is an attached dependency property, that is, it is declared and used by one type and set on another.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.ConditionProperty>er en vedlagte avhengighetsegenskap som er det er deklarert som brukes av én type og angitt i en annen.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.ConditionProperty>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, there must be static `get` and `set` methods on the type declaring the property.
trans-unit.target: Det derfor må være statiske `get` og `set` metoder for typen deklarerer egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Helper method for setting <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.ConditionProperty>.
trans-unit.target: Helper metode for å angi <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.ConditionProperty>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.ConditionProperty>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"></xref> (or derived type) that contains a condition property, such as the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity"></xref> and <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref> activities.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyObject"> </xref> (eller avledede typen) som inneholder en condition-egenskap som den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity"> </xref> og <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref> aktiviteter.

trans-unit.source: The condition type to set on the dependency object, such as an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Betingelsen som angitt for avhengighet-objektet som en <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a cloned activity tree to which changes can be made and then applied to the running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer et klonede aktivitetstre som kan endringer gjøres og brukes til kjører arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> that contains the cloned root activity for the workflow.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"> </xref> som inneholder klonede roten aktiviteten for arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: Validates the current set of proposed changes that have been made to the activity tree represented by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.TransientWorkflow*> property.
trans-unit.target: Validerer gjeldende settet med endringer som er gjort i aktivitetstreet som representerer den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.TransientWorkflow*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowChanges.TransientWorkflow*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"></xref> object that contains any errors or warnings that occurred during validation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.ValidationErrorCollection"> </xref> objekt som inneholder feil eller advarsler som oppstod under validering.
